name: Cadw Swn Complete - DVD and Course Book
description:
Fancy picking up the complete course - the book plus all the recordings -  at a bargain price? 

We've produced a computer DVD which contains all the recordings in a PC/Mac format which you can listen to on your computer using Windows Media Player or iTunes or transfer to your iPod/digital audio player etc. You can even use your computer to burn them to CDs (for your own private use)!

Out now! Includes a printed course book. 

<iframe width="100%" height="166" scrolling="no" frameborder="no" src="http://w.soundcloud.com/player/?url=http%3A%2F%2Fapi.soundcloud.com%2Ftracks%2F51642686&auto_play=false&show_artwork=false&color=2f3194"></iframe>

name: Welsh Vocabulary Booster CD - PC and Mac
description:
As well as Cadw Swn Colin writes games and apps for computers and tablets (check out Clockwork the Mouse in the apple app store).

So it was only a matter of time before he connected computers and Cymraeg and decided to write ‘The Cadw Swn Welsh Vocabulary Booster’; a fun way to blast through your Welsh vocabulary. It runs on Windows and Apple Mac OSX.

We think it’s a must for anyone interested in improving their Welsh vocabulary – a major factor in reaching fluency after all.

Each time you run the software the program generates 25 random questions from its bank of around 200 questions.

Some questions ask you to select the correct Welsh word from a selection of three, often with a colourful picture to cement the word into your memory.

Other questions ask you to match up a list of Welsh and English words or phrases. We believe that simply having to choose from a set of alternatives will help you learn quicker and smarter. And it’s a lot more fun than rummaging through a dictionary!

Finally, you get a score, and the chance to review your answers to see where you succeeded and failed. You might like to think of it as your own personal vocabulary tutor. Ah, but what would a personal Welsh tutor cost?

Software requirements: Windows 98 or above, Mac OSX.

name: Getting Quiet - Audio CD
description:
A short course to help quiet the mind, by Colin Jones.

<iframe width="100%" height="166" scrolling="no" frameborder="no" src="http://w.soundcloud.com/player/?url=http%3A%2F%2Fapi.soundcloud.com%2Ftracks%2F51648522&auto_play=false&show_artwork=false&color=2f3194"></iframe>

There may be times when a quieter mind can give you a richer experience of life, a more direct connection with your world. It doesn’t matter what religion you follow, if any – we are concerned with your experience of the physical, everyday world.

Getting Quiet comes from a simple idea – that by quieting our minds we can have a more direct experience of life.

As we go through life we tend to pick up mental baggage – opinions, habits, preconceptions and other thought patterns. Now there will be times when these thought patterns will be very useful – the fear of fire, for example. However, the mental noise which goes on in our heads can sometimes cloud our experience of our world.

Using Getting Quiet, when we choose to and when we are in a safe environment, we can begin to quiet the mind. By doing so we can experience our lives more directly, clearly and richly.

Getting Quiet is a short, practical course (under an hour of audio recordings) which guides the listener along a clear path to a quieter mind. It requires no changes of belief, since it is only concerned with our direct experience of our environment.

Among other things, the course shows us our genius mind, but also our idiot mind – the voice which sometimes goes on for too long in our head.

Then, through a series of practical exercises we begin to learn how to ‘turn the volume down’ on our thoughts, but only when we choose to.

Please listen to the recordings in a safe environment, where you can devote your full attention to them. Getting Quiet is not a replacement for any professional help or advice you may need.

name: Extra Course Book
description: Why not learn with a friend? You can meet up once or twice a week, help each other practice and make your learning fly by.

name: Clockwork the Mouse - Signed Print
description:
Clocwaith y Llygoden - Clockwork the Mouse is a huge cartoon adventure for the iPad and iPhone (search for Clockwork the Mouse in the app store if you're interested.

The game contains beautiful hand-drawn artwork by Colin, which was scanned into the computer and coloured. We've produced a print of the characters 'pink dragons' from the game individually signed by Colin.

Shipped rolled, not folded, in a secure tube, this artwork will brighten up any room. The print is on high quality A3 paper (297x420mm).

Limited quantities - order now!
